Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and

A generalist algorithm for cell and nucleus segmentation that can be

Converts and organises raw MRI data-sets according to the Brain Imaging
Data Structure (BIDS).

PyQtGraph is a pure-python graphics and GUI library intended for use in
